definitions: in a way that relates to reproduction without the fusion of gametes

examples.text: bacteria reproducing asexually double their numbers rapidly

shortDefinitions: in way that relates to reproduction without fusion of gametes

definitions: in a way that lacks sexual feelings or associations

examples.text: they are living together asexually like a brother and sister
she dresses asexually in baggy clothes

shortDefinitions: in way that lacks sexual feelings or associations
